page.title: 05GALA WEEK AT TORTHORWALD
page.content: Every year there is a Gala Week run by Torthorwald Community Council. The 1985 Gala, held in the last week of June, was sponsored by British Telecom. The following events were organised: 5 km Mini Marathon Licensed barbecue/disco in church field A programme of European Dance presented by Torthorwald School Beetle Drive in Torthorwald Hall 5_a_side Football Tournament in church field Fancy Dress Competition Teenage Disco Gala Day _ Sports, welly throwing, sponge throwing, obstacle, Go_kart, Beat the Goalie, rifle shooting, 5_a_side, Family Buffet/Dance etc.
